Text: Travel Plans for Monday November Cc Is the closest hotel to the Enron office the Doubletree Do you have an address or phone number I was thinking that perhaps we should plan to have dinner on Monday evening This would be a good opportunity to get acquainted Are you available Please let me know as we have not made our airline reservations I think we will take the flight back to Minneapolis I assume that we should plan to leave the office no later than Will this work or do we need to leave earlier

Potential Houston Meeting DatesThere are a growing number of things for us to discuss relative to gas supply for Pleasant Valley Station I would like to suggest the following dates to meet in Houston Choice November a morning meeting Choice Novemer a morning meeting Please let me know and reply all in your response if one or both dates work I will put together an agenda of the items for discussion

Confirmation of Forward Purchase Cc As we discussed I never received a confirmation of the May June and July forward gas purchase per day at Ventura at mmBtu This purchase was made through Brian Frihart I need to know if Enron plans to stand behind this purchase Without confirmation I will assume that the deal is no longer valid

Forward Contract Close OutGreat River Energy has been advised to close out the forward contract of May June and July per day pruchase price of mmBtu at Ventura I am open to a settlement based on the change in the market price for May June and July at Ventura Lets discuss today

ENA Support of GRE Gas Purchase and Risk Management DecisionsPeriodically I need some help in data gathering for analysis Is it possible for someone at Enron to occasionally provide the gas market data that I need I would like to look at the following data for and prior to our November meeting Daily Henry Hub Prices Daily Ventura Prices Monthly Index Henry Hub Inside FERC Gas Market Report Monthly Index Ventura Inside FERC Gas Market Report Please give me a call

Conference Call Tuesday November at Mary Jo and I cancelled the Houston meeting due to the high level of uncertainity of Enron There are important items related to winter and spring Pleasant Valley gas operation to review I recommend a brief conference call at Tuesday I will call Darron and Janet Mary Jo will be in my office NovGasMtgdoc Darron I would like to excuse NNG and continue our discussion after we discuss the above items NovGasMtgdoc

RE Conference CallI will be I my office Original Message From mailto Sent Monday November AM To Carl Sulzer GREER FuelPlant Subject Conference Call Carl I was supposed to be traveling this morning but because of the crash in NY it has been postponed to tomorrow I will be in a Dallas airport at the time of our call tomorrow morning Should I use as the number to use for our conference call If not let me know I look forward to our conversation Thanks DG This email is the property of Enron Corp andor its relevant affiliate and may contain confidential and privileged material for the sole use of the intended recipient s Any review use distribution or disclosure by others is strictly prohibited If you are not the intended recipient or authorized to receive for the recipient please contact the sender or reply to Enron Corp at and delete all copies of the message This email and any attachments hereto are not intended to be an offer or an acceptance and do not create or evidence a binding and enforceable contract between Enron Corp or any of its affiliates and the intended recipient or any other party and may not be relied on by anyone as the basis of a contract by estoppel or otherwise Thank you

Fixed Forward Contract Purchase VenturaWe are looking to lock in some gas for May June and July of Would you check with the traders on the price qoutes for per day at Ventura May per day June per day July per day Please call me at

RE Fixed Forward Contract Purchase VenturaI talked to Brian Frihart on Friday and purchased fixed forward contracts per day for May per day for June and per day for July at I would like to purchase some more Lets talk Original Message From mailto Sent Monday November AM To Carl Sulzer GREER FuelPlant Subject RE Fixed Forward Contract Purchase Ventura I was out of the office on Friday Ill call you later this morning with a quote Thanks DG Original Message From Carl Sulzer GREER FuelPlant ENRON Sent Friday November AM To Giron Darron C Subject Fixed Forward Contract Purchase Ventura We are looking to lock in some gas for May June and July of Would you check with the traders on the price qoutes for per day at Ventura May per day June per day July per day Please call me at This email is the property of Enron Corp andor its relevant affiliate and may contain confidential and privileged material for the sole use of the intended recipient s Any review use distribution or disclosure by others is strictly prohibited If you are not the intended recipient or authorized to receive for the recipient please contact the sender or reply to Enron Corp at and delete all copies of the message This email and any attachments hereto are not intended to be an offer or an acceptance and do not create or evidence a binding and enforceable contract between Enron Corp or any of its affiliates and the intended recipient or any other party and may not be relied on by anyone as the basis of a contract by estoppel or otherwise Thank you
